content: 5 inches ending k1 after a ws row place stitches on holder or row 2 rs *k3 p1* to last 3 stitches k3 scrap yarn back seeded rib in the round over odd number of stitches cast on 75 87 99 111 123 135 stitches work in flat seeded rib for 3 5 inches ending row 1 p1 *k1 p3* to last 2 stitches k1 p1 after ws row work across rs of back stitches row 2 *k3 p1* to last 3 k3 one more time co 1 using backwards loop cast place marker for side join and work across seeded rib in the round over even number of front stitches in pattern co 1 using backwards stitches loop cast on and place marker for bor 152 row 1 p1 *k1 p3* to last 3 stitches k1 p2 176 200 224 248 272 stitches row 2 *k3 p1* to end body slipped stitch in the round *work row 1 of seeded rib in the round over odd number of stitches for first 15 15 19 19 row 1 p2 sl1wyib *p3 sl1wyib* to last 2 p2 23 23 stitches pm work in row 1 of slipped stitch in the round to 16 16 20 20 24 24 row 2 p2 k1 *p3 k1* to last 2 p2 stitches before side marker pm work row 1 of slipped stitch flat seeded rib in the round over even number of stitches slip side marker and repeat from * to row 1 ws k2 sl1wyif *k3 sl1wyif* to last 2 end of round next row *work row 2 seeded rib k2 in the round over odd number of stitches to row 2 rs p2 k1 *p3 k1* to last 2 p2 marker slip marker work row 2 of body stitch to marker work row 2 of seeded rib in the round over even number of stitches to side marker slip marker and repeat from * to end of repeat these two row until body measures 15 inches or desired length from back hem ending after row 1 work next row in pattern stopping 3 3 4 4 4 5 stitches from end of round bind off next 5 5 7 7 7 9 stitches work to 3 3 4 4 4 5 stitches before side marker bind off next 5 5 7 7 7 9 stitch- es work to end 142 166 186 210 234 254 stitches total 71 83 93 105 117 127 for each front and back slide back stitches onto scrap yarn or holder and prepare to work front armhole shaping this pattern copyright
